Please let this issue rest, die and rot. SQUAD shelved the barn for a reason.

Increase the building upgrade levels from 3 to 4 and make the barn yard stuff the new starting level.

Get Rover Dude to bring his Sounding Rockets mod in as stock for the first level parts.

I like two thirds of this idea. The other third?

The barn tier as shown to us is poorly designed. There were parts that do not look like they were built for kerbals, with scaling issues that mean that doorways are twice the kerbal's height, windows and railings that aren't very useful, as they're too high for them to be useful. There are parts which made no sense at all, with roads leading to a wall of sandbags... with a gap a road's width away. And all done in poorly chosen textures that don't help the issues.

If we are to get a barn tier, I strongly hope that it ends up being better thought out and implemented than that one.

Please let this issue rest, die and rot. SQUAD shelved the barn for a reason.

If you don't know the reasons just search the forum.

They shelved it for quality not because a bunch of realism kids threw a fit.

That being said the jump from tier 1 to tier 2 is big clearly they originally intended to have 4 tiers but they had to condense things down to 3 when they had to go back to the drawing board on a 3rd of their new assets. The "barn" will return (lest there be more flames and twitter campaigns if something else were implemented) but it will be redone at a higher acceptable level of quality.
Barn was withdrawn for reworking, but will be back. Let's PLEASE not go through another round of barn hate. It was a year ago. Let it go, for pity's sake.
